 1992-24871992-12-030,  ,  FIN,  , 
PrecisTOWN OF CASSIAR REMISSION ORDER - which provides for the remission of income tax, penalties and interest on severance payments and relocation assistance received by certain residents of the Town of Cassiar, British Columbia, as a result of the shutting-down of the mining operations carried on by Cassiar Mining Corporation.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1992-0214 Publication Date: 1992-12-16
